Hi All, the reason that Yuris Revenge won't work on some computers is you need to update Red Alert 2 to version 1.006 otherwise Yuris Revenge won't work.

For those who can't find the crack, it's in the "CRACK" folder in the cd image. Just mount the BIN file with Daemon Tools to find it.

I have not yet been able to find a way to update the cracked RA2 to V1.006 because when you run the update, it checks to make sure that ra2.exe (and possibly game.exe) is original. If you are using a cracked version of those files then it won't let you update - so you won't be able to play Yuris Revenge.

If anyone has found a way to get the updated version 1.006 files please post it here so that everyone can run Yuris Revenge.

its very easy to convert bin file.
u must have winrar (or izarc) software installed on your pc.
open this bin file in winrar (or izarc) & convert it.
ie.. bin --> iso.

and burn this iso file in a empty cd...
now u had the full version & go ahead to install...



regards
Ginesh...
India.

there is no need to udpate the game...

simply go to the below site:
http://www.izarc.org/download.html

and download izarc software, install it.

open izarc, goto Tools--> Convert to CD image.

simply convert that bin file to iso file.
and burn it in a blank cd.

easily install it & enjoy....

have fun...

Regards
Ginesh...
Chennai, India.

1) To play online you need a valid serial key - buy the game
2) You can play LAN over internet using Hamachi (google it)
3) Use this patch: http://www.understorm.net/cnc/lan/ts_ra2.php for playing over network on vista
4) To play on vista, set the compatability of ra2.exe to 2000 or XP, and right click ra2.exe and click Run as Administrator

The Crack included is not necessary, (unless you feel lazy to mount the image file (.cue) repeatedly) because if you apply the patch then copy the crack, the update will be removed.

HOW TO PLAY yuri ONLINE on a cracked server
If you guys would like to play online. Download this,Install it. make sure you include internet components. Anyways having done that. Try connecting to the internet once. you will be asked to download somthing. Accept it. Once you're finished. Exit the game and press the win key + R, you will be shown the run prompt. Type this \WINDOWS\system32\drivers\etc\hosts and start it.
you will then be asked how you want it to be open, select notepad. Or any other text editor, and in put these lines at the bottom..

195.189.238.82 servserv.westwood.com
195.189.238.82 irc.westwood.com
195.189.238.82 gameres.westwood.com
195.189.238.82 apiregister.westwood.com

Your file should look like this

# Copyright (c) 1993-1999 Microsoft Corp.
#
# This is a sample HOSTS file used by Microsoft TCP/IP for Windows.
#
# This file contains the mappings of IP addresses to host names. Each
# entry should be kept on an individual line. The IP address should
# be placed in the first column followed by the corresponding host name.
# The IP address and the host name should be separated by at least one
# space.
#
# Additionally, comments (such as these) may be inserted on individual
# lines or following the machine name denoted by a '#' symbol.
#
# For example:
#
# 102.54.94.97 rhino.acme.com # source server
# 38.25.63.10 x.acme.com # x client host

127.0.0.1 localhost
195.189.238.82 servserv.westwood.com
195.189.238.82 irc.westwood.com
195.189.238.82 gameres.westwood.com
195.189.238.82 apiregister.westwood.com

Save the file and start RA2

your password must be 8 characters
